attributes.additional_details: I want the government to ban dredging in the UK because it destroys sea life and damages our environment. Dredging involves dragging a huge metal rake across the sea bed to search for fish,but,at the same time, rips up coral and kills many animals. Did you know that dredging is one of the main reasons for dolphins being endangered? Dredging is destroying our seas. We need to stop it.Please sign my petition,an save our oceans
